scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:e2e && npm run coverage:unit && npm run coverage:merge && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:e2e: rimraf coverage .nyc_output && cross-env COLLECT_COVERAGE=true playwright test
scripts.coverage:merge: rimraf .nyc_output_merged && mkdir .nyc_output_merged && (if exist .nyc_output\*.json copy .nyc_output\*.json .nyc_output_merged) && (if exist .nyc_output_unit\coverage-final.json copy .nyc_output_unit\coverage-final.json .nyc_output_merged)
scripts.coverage:report: nyc report --reporter=html --reporter=text --report-dir coverage --temp-dir .nyc_output_merged --exclude playwright.config.ts --exclude vite.config.js --exclude vitest.setup.js
